mapper.insert:
insert into mcsw.master(college, target, major, type, score, remarks, user_id, create_time, update_time) values
(#{entity.college}, #{entity.target}, #{entity.major}, #{entity.type}, #{entity.score}, #{entity.remarks}, #{entity.userId}, #{entity.createTime}, #{entity.updateTime})

insert into mcsw.master(college, target, major, type, score, remarks, user_id, create_time, update_time) values
(#{entity.college}, #{entity.target}, #{entity.major}, #{entity.type}, #{entity.score}, #{entity.remarks}, #{entity.userId}, #{entity.createTime}, #{entity.updateTime})
on duplicate key update college = values(college) , target = values(target) , major = values(major) , type = values(type) , score = values(score) , remarks = values(remarks) , user_id = values(user_id) , create_time = values(create_time) , update_time = values(update_time)
